sentences.en: All indications are that it is everywhere basaltic and relatively constant in composition.
sentences.cn: 所有的迹象只表明海洋地壳处都是玄武岩质的,组成也比较稳定.

sentences.en: Basaltic in the mountains built the temple, Lingyun Ge, the founder Dian, Antique - Shouting , such as construction.
sentences.cn: 山中建有玄武庙 、 凌云阁, 祖师殿 、 仁寿亭等仿古建筑.

sentences.en: Basaltic lava first erupted from the center and built up the volcano.
sentences.cn: 首先是玄武岩浆从中间喷发,构成火山.

sentences.en: Frantz Josef Land is a basaltic plateau split into many islands and covered with ice.
sentences.cn: 法兰仕约瑟夫地的群岛是由一个玄武岩高原分裂而成的，终年覆盖着冰雪。

sentences.en: Hydrogen partition coefficients between nominally anhydrous minerals and basaltic melts.
sentences.cn: 名义上的无水矿石和玄武岩熔点之间的氢分割系数.

sentences.en: In the course of the investigation, the PUC charge related to the leadership of basaltic sub - command.
sentences.cn: 在侦查过程中, 市局相关领导亲自坐镇玄武 分局 指挥.

sentences.en: In the Liaodong and Shandong Peninsulas, there are basaltic plateaus.
sentences.cn: 辽东半岛和山东半岛上, 则出现玄武岩高原.

sentences.en: In this image streaks of dark basaltic sand have been carried frombelow the ice layer to form fan-shaped deposits on top of the seasonalice.
sentences.cn: 在这幅图像中黑色玄武岩沙带被从冰层下面显露出来，在季节性冰盖的顶部形成扇形堆积。

sentences.en: Researchers have found the deposits contain opaline silica and iron sulfates, which you would expect to find if acidic water once flowed over basaltic materials in low temperatures.
sentences.cn: 研究人员发现，这些沉积物中含有乳白石英和铁硫酸盐，而这些东西只出现在低温状态下被酸性水侵蚀的玄武岩地区。
